title: Ultimate ironman helm

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Ultimate ironman helm is a full helm obtainable only by players who chose to be an Ultimate ironman in Ironman Mode. It is obtained by speaking to Adam after leaving Tutorial Island, after choosing to be an Ultimate ironman.

Ultimate ironman helm
Released13 October 2014 (Update)
MembersNo

Weight0.907 kg
Advanced data
Item ID12813

The Ultimate ironman helm is a full helm obtainable only by players who chose to be an Ultimate ironman in Ironman Mode. It is obtained by speaking to Adam after leaving Tutorial Island, after choosing to be an Ultimate ironman.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+6+7+5-1+6
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The helmet's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

12 August 2020
(update)

The destroy text has been updated to reflect the Ironman tutor's name change.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text contains the acronym "J.A.R.V.I.S.", which is the name of the artificial intelligence assistant from Marvel Comics's Iron Man.

The '''Ultimate ironman helm''' is a full helm obtainable only by players who chose to be an Ultimate ironman in [[Ironman Mode]]. It is obtained by speaking to [[Adam]] after leaving [[Tutorial Island]], after choosing to be an Ultimate ironman.
